milestones.title: Full Stack Web Development Completed
milestones.details: I will complete full-stack web development by October 31, 2025, and be fluent in English, InshaAllah.

milestones.title: Build a Micro AI SaaS Product
milestones.details: Between November 1 and December 31, 2025, I will build a micro AI SaaS product, InshaAllah, from which I can earn at least $1,000 monthly.

milestones.title: AI Engineering Studies Begin
milestones.details: I will begin my AI engineering studies on January 1, 2026, InshaAllah.

milestones.title: AI Product Development or Growth of Existing SaaS
milestones.details: I will develop AI products such as AI SaaS and AI agents, or grow an existing AI SaaS, InshaAllah.

milestones.title: AI-powered SaaS Generating $10K in Revenue
milestones.details: Between January 1 and May 31, 2026, I will build an AI-powered SaaS that generates $10,000 in revenue, InshaAllah.

milestones.title: Personal Branding
milestones.details: I will create content on YouTube, Instagram, X, Facebook, and LinkedIn, sharing insights on AI, startups, and philosophy, InshaAllah.

milestones.title: Relocation to Dhaka
milestones.details: I need $30,000 to relocate to Dhaka and settle there before July 31, 2026, InshaAllah.

milestones.title: Preparing for the Most Important Day of My Life
milestones.details: Make preparations to meet the most important person in my life, scale SaaS to $30,000 MRR, hire team and branding staff, and grow to 300,000 followers, InshaAllah.

milestones.title: Significant Life Event
milestones.details: I will speak with someone special on November 1, 2026. This will be the most significant day of my life, InshaAllah.

milestones.title: $300,000 Before Marriage
milestones.details: I will earn $300,000 before marriage in 2027, InshaAllah.

milestones.title: Marriage
milestones.details: I will get married in 2027, InshaAllah, after successfully completing all previous milestones.

milestones.title: AI Startup Launch
milestones.details: Before turning 24, I will launch an exceptional AI startup that solves real-life problems and generates significant revenue, InshaAllah.

milestones.title: Becoming a Millionaire
milestones.details: Before turning 24, I will earn at least $1,000,000, InshaAllah.
